duties_responsibilities.duty: Manufacture sausage products according to specifications
Work together with other team members to achieve blending results in safety, yields, usages, and efficiencies
Participate in daily meetings and project teams
Think pro-actively and understand how formulation affects plant flow
Set personal and team goals and objectives to support performance and the company's way
Setup production equipment, use cleaning and sanitizing chemicals, and operate machinery
Obtain forklift license and maintain a safe driving record
Operate grinders and department equipment, use SAP software, and complete documentation paperwork
Obtain and maintain a fork-lift license, work with chemicals, and operate equipment
Maintain Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs) and adhere to safety regulations
